| Event                   | Description | Type                            |
| ----------------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------- |
| `my-event-with-options` |             | `CustomEvent<{ mph: number; }>` |
| `myDocumentEvent`       |             | `CustomEvent<any>`              |
| `myWindowEvent`         |             | `CustomEvent<number>`           |

### `methodThatFiresEventWithOptions() => Promise<void>`
